tweet: It really pains me to see people thinking that "Low Fat" is HEALTHY!
I wish people could understand that the best source of energy period is burning fat - say goodbye to carbohydrates as your energy source.
There is an abundance of studies linking excessive carbohydrate consumption to obesity and degenerative diseases.
There are NO essential carbohydrates, since the body can make ALL its required carbohydrates from either protein or fat.
